#This page tells how to run the engine .

= Stream =
==In Class ==
The stream can be configured in the class DebugUI.

==Config File==
The stream can also be configured by an input file describing the stream specs.
===Example===
streamSize = 100000
maxPrice = 1000
maxSymbol = 2
maxVolume = 1000
randomSeed = 10
increaseProbability = 70
end

===Explanation===
  * *streamSize*: specifies the number of events in the input stream 
  * *maxPrice*: specifies the maximum value for the attribute "Price"
  * *maxSymbol*: specifies the maximum value for the attribute "Symbol"
  * *maxVolume*: specifies the maximum value for the attribute "Volume"
  * *randomSeed*: the seed for random number generator
  * *increaseProbability*: specifies the probability that the price increases
  * *end*: specifies the end of the input file

= Query =
We provide a bunch of example queries, you can find them in path: /sase-publish/query

= Commands =
===Example===


java -Xms100m -Xmx3000m edu.umass.cs.sase.UI.CommandLineUI $HOME/sase-publish/query/performance/sigmod06/DomainSize/domainsize.query $HOME/sase-publish/query/performance/sigmod06/DomainSize/domainsize100.stream 0  >>06results/ds100.result

===Explanation===
  * *edu.umass.cs.sase.UI.CommandLineUI*, the main class
  * *$HOME/sase-publish/query/performance/sigmod06/DomainSize/domainsize.query*, the query file location
